description:
Momoka has a cunning plan: she`s going to invite Fuyuki to the beach for a romantic day, and confess her feelings.  But his family and all three frogs decide to come, as well!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka Love-Love Nankai Dai Sakusen de Arimasu / Momoka Hyu~doro Nankai Dai Sakusen de Arimasu
Vacances au soleil / Un drôle de fantôme
桃華ラブラブ南海大作戦 であります / 桃華ひゅ~どろ南海大作戦 であります
